definition: variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle

sentences.english: Indeed, pain and itch have been difficult to separate.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，疼痛和瘙痒一直以来都很难分开。

sentences.english: Tinea cruris is a fungal pruritic dermatitis in the inguinal region.
sentences.chinese: 股癣是一种真菌在腹股沟区的瘙痒性皮炎。

sentences.english: He developed a pruritic erythematous maculopapular rash on his lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 他的下肢出现瘙痒性红色斑丘疹。

sentences.english: The child presented with generalised redness of the skin and itching all over his body.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子表现为全身皮肤发红和瘙痒。

sentences.english: Why would you let your foot itch intolerably when you are able to scratch it?
sentences.chinese: 既然你可以骚骚痒，你为什么让你的脚受瘙痒之苦呢？

sentences.english: There is often pain, itching or tingling in the area where the rash develops.
sentences.chinese: 当皮疹发展时皮疹区域通常会有疼痛，瘙痒或麻刺感。

sentences.english: But benzoyl peroxide dries out skin causing itching or allergic reactions.
sentences.chinese: 但过氧化苯甲酰干出引起皮肤瘙痒或过敏性反应。

sentences.english: But the question is an itch that certainly needs a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 但这个问题就像皮肤瘙痒需要挠挠一样。

sentences.english: Objective To understand allergens in the itch Dermatoses.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解瘙痒性皮肤病的变应原情况。

sentences.english: Pruritus is an essential feature of atopic dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 瘙痒是特应性皮炎的一个基本特征。

sentences.english: Less commonly, the skin lesions begin as pruritic red macules or papules .
sentences.chinese: 在少数情况，皮肤病损开始于瘙痒的红色斑疹或丘疹。

sentences.english: The only thing you can give is antihistamine to reduce itching.
sentences.chinese: 你唯一可以给予抗组织胺，减少瘙痒。

sentences.english: Pruritus was the most common adverse experience.
sentences.chinese: 瘙痒症是最常见的不良体验。

sentences.english: Use all over body to strengthen, tone and nourish skin and fight itchiness.
sentences.chinese: 可以在全身使用加强，均色，滋养肌肤，对抗瘙痒。

sentences.english: Not only do these insects leave itchy bites, they can also spread disease.
sentences.chinese: 蚊子叮咬不仅留下瘙痒的红包，还会传播疾病。

definition: variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle
